text: Why doesn ’ t Kanye West smile? Kim Kardashian ’ s first family photo since arrival of new baby girl sparks questions from fans KANYE West is rarely pictured with a smile on his face. Kim Kardashian and Kanye West were not smiling in their first family photo [ Kim Kardashian / Instagram ] Although having three beautiful children, North, four, Saint, two, and Chicago, three months, with his wife Kim Kardashian – the most famous woman on the planet – Kanye West is rarely seen smiling. As Kim and Kanye shared their first photo as a family of five on Instagram on March 4, the couple were inundated with questions as to why they looked so unhappy, despite their gorgeous children in high spirits alongside them
